Module cs230
Package cs230.model.entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
cs230.model.entity.Entity
cs230.model.entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
The Player class handles the player data and describes how the can act in the game.
Author:
Dafydd-Rhys Maund
